# @hapi/hoek

#### Utility methods for the hapi ecosystem.

**hoek** is part of the **hapi** ecosystem and was designed to work seamlessly with the [hapi web framework](https:

This module is not intended to solve every problem for everyone, but rather as a central place to store hapi-specific methods. If you're looking for a general purpose utility module, check out [lodash](https:

### Visit the [hapi.dev](https:
